alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 8:36AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Jackson. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water backs up into several creeks and streams in the Jackson area. Water is under some homes near the river in the Byram area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 27.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning and continue rising to a crest of 30.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Jackson 28.0 27.8 Mon 8 am CDT 29.1 29.6 29.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
